trans-unit.source: Represents a control that renders text that can be changed by the user.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controle que renderiza texto que pode ser alterado pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: Controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> and those that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, provide a text property that can be changed by a page user.
trans-unit.target: Controles, como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> e aqueles que derivam de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, forneça uma propriedade de texto que pode ser alterada por um usuário da página.

trans-unit.source: When the text property is changed, an event is raised to notify handlers that the property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade text é alterada, um evento é gerado para notificar os manipuladores que a propriedade é alterada.

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl> must define the <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: As classes que implementam <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl> deve definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl> interface contains only the <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged> event, it inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl> interface, which defines a <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl> interface contém apenas o <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged> evento, ele herda o <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl> interface, que define um <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl> interface, a control must define the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged> event that occurs when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A> property changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: Para implementar o <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl> interface, um controle deve definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A> propriedade e o <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged> evento que ocorre quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A> alterações de propriedade entre postagens para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: In those classes, the event is raised through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnTextChanged%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.OnTextChanged%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods.
trans-unit.target: Nessas classes, o evento é gerado por meio de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnTextChanged%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.OnTextChanged%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> métodos.

trans-unit.source: A class that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl> interface could define a similar method for raising the event.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe que implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl> interface pode definir um método semelhante para disparar o evento.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra uma implementação do <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content of the text changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o conteúdo do texto é alterado entre as postagens no servidor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged> event occurs when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A> property changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged> evento ocorre quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A> alterações de propriedade entre postagens para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: An implementation of this event can be found in either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> control.
trans-unit.target: Uma implementação desse evento pode ser encontrada no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra uma implementação do <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged> evento.
